alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 18 at 6:56AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory is in effect... * WHAT...Surf up to 10 to 12 feet. * WHERE...Southern and eastern shores of all islands. * WHEN...through Tuesday. * IMPACTS...MINOR...Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Precautionary/Prepardness Actions: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officals and exercise caution. && Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 656 TAEAO ASO SA SETEMA 18 2022 ...Ua iai nei le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga ma malolosi e 10 i le 12 futu. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasae o motu uma o le atunu`u. * TAIMI...Seia oo i le Aso Lua. * AAFIAGA...LAITI...O le a iai taimi e fafati maualuluga ai galu i le matafaga ma le aau, e aave foi le sami e faafaigatama lamatia ai fuafuaga tumatafaga. e ono tutupu foi nai saloga i talafatai o le atunuu. E iai foi taimi, e ono fafati ai galu i le muliava (gatu) o le uafu. Puipui/Tapenaga Faatino: Tagata uma o loo tafafaoi le matafaga, auau, fa`apea le `au fa`ase`e galu, e tatau ona fa`autagiaina fautuaga uma e aumaiae tagata o loo puipuia le saogalemu ma ia faatinoina ma le faaeteete.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
